title: Can't patch client
body:
Whenever I open the client, I get this error, "Something is up with our servers and its preventing you from patching. We're giving it another shot. In the meantime you can check the status of our servers here. (error code 003)

It's really frustrating because I didn't have this error before, and have already updated it to 7.3, I tried the hextech repair tool, and switching to legacy client, in legacy client I get the http error. 

anyone know a fix?

replies.body: i fixed it go to the folder where your game is installed then go to rads projects lol_game_client and delete releases it will delete the last patch and you will have to download the last patch again it fixed it for me trust me !!

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\league_client_sln\releases
Had the same problem, just delete the files in the folder above and it should work just fine
Looks like i'm not the only one :/

That error message unfortunately doesn't say enough to know what's going on.  I wasn't able to see any issues with our patching servers.  What error do you get instead on the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know, and we'll go from there.

i have the same Issue, i ran the update today and it does not want o patch, i ave tried all the lol.laucher options i have ran the Hextech Repair Tool, my husband also did the update and his game patched on the same line connection as mine, i can not play the game at all at the moment can you please assist me please, 


I was able to copy my Husbands patched game to continue to play - hope that this is a solution out there for every one ells how  is still having this issue.

Hi there,

I'd like to inform you that you should try to use the ''Full repair option'' in the option menu of the Client.

It helped me, it might help you too.
well can you please tell me how long it took you ? i've been waiting for 50mins now but still there is no repair going on {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
